title: 130 Grams Per Hour: Inside the Wild Carbohydrate Strategy of a Tour de France Stage-Winner
content:
Campenaerts' stage-smashing fueling pushes thresholds further than ever before in a Tour de France 'arms race' of nutrition, tech, aerodynamics.

Read the full article at 130 Grams Per Hour: Inside the Wild Carbohydrate Strategy of a Tour de France Stage-Winner on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
